EmailTemplate.description: Email for sub recipients to remind them about filling the achieved goals and objectives quarters
EmailTemplate.name: Deadline for Quarter
EmailTemplate.subject: Deadline for Achieved quarter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Form2ApplicantName__c},
This email is to notify you that, tomorrow is the deadline for updating the achieved goals for this quarter.
For more details kindly login to the UtahGrants System.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the UtahGrants Support Team at utahgrants.support@reisystems.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, UtahGrants Support Team utahgrants.support@reisystems.com Ph. No. 703.480.9100
